revisions.rev:
[[Image:BrettFavre.jpg|alt=|thumb|right|[[Brett Favre]], the all-time leader in consecutive starts by an NFL player.]] This is a list of the '''most consecutive starts and games played''' by a player by position in the [[National Football League|NFL]].<ref name="ESPN.com: Double Coverage: Favre vs. Ripken">[http://espn.go.com/blog/nflnation/post/_/id/30418/double-coverage-favre-vs-ripken ESPN.com: Double Coverage: Favre vs. Ripken]</ref><ref name="Iron-Man Favre To Make 200th Consecutive Start As Packers-Rams Clash On Monday Night Football">[http://www0.nfl.packers.com/news/releases/2004/11/24/2/ Packers.com: Iron-Man Favre To Make 200th Consecutive Start As Packers-Rams Clash On Monday Night Football]</ref>
[[Brett Favre|Brett Favre's]] starts streak of 297 games is the longest all-time.<ref name="271 starts">{{cite web | work=NFL.com | url=http://www.nfl.com/news/story?id=09000d5d812bff3a&template=with-video-with-comments&confirm=true| title=Vikings QB Favre 'grateful' after his NFL-record 271st start in a row| accessdate= 2009-09-21}}</ref><ref>{{cite web | work=NFL.com | url=http://www.nfl.com/news/story/09000d5d81ce178f/article/favres-consecutive-start-streak-comes-to-an-end-at-297?module=HP_headlines| title=Favre's consecutive start streak comes to an end at 297| accessdate= 2010-12-14}}</ref> Among defensive players, [[Jim Marshall (American football)|Jim Marshall's]] starts streak of 270 is the longest all-time.<ref name="271 starts">[http://www.nfl.com/news/story?id=09000d5d812bff3a&template=with-video-with-comments&confirm=true NFL.com: Vikings QB Favre 'grateful' after his NFL-record 271st start in a row]</ref> Of special note is punter [[Jeff Feagles]], who played in 352 consecutive games which is the longest of all-time for a special teams player.<ref>[http://www.profootballhof.com/story/2005/12/6/1884/ Feagles feat recognized]</ref> Special teams players are not credited with starts in the NFL.<ref name="ESPN.com: Double Coverage: Favre vs. Ripken"/><ref name="Jeff Feagles - Game Logs">{{cite web | work=NFL.com | url=http://www.nfl.com/players/jefffeagles/gamelogs?id=FEA207645&season=2009 | title=Jeff Feagles - Game Logs | accessdate= 2010-11-11}}</ref> [[Ronde Barber]] is the most recent player to surpass someone at his position for consecutive starts, having bested [[Dick LeBeau]]'s previous mark for cornerbacks in 2010.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.foxsportsflorida.com/10/18/10/Tampa-Bay-secondary-burned-again/landing_bucs.html?blockID=333681&feedID=6913|title=Tampa Bay secondary burned again|accessdate =2010-12-03}}</ref>
''Updated through the 2011 season in progress''
'''''Bold''' denotes an active streak''
==Leader boards== ===Consecutive games started=== ====All-time==== [[Image:Manning cropped.jpg|alt=|thumb|right|[[Peyton Manning]] is the most recent player to achieve 200 consecutive starts by an NFL player.]] ''Minimum 200 consecutive regular season starts''<ref name="ESPN.com: Double Coverage: Favre vs. Ripken"/><ref name="Iron-Man Favre To Make 200th Consecutive Start As Packers-Rams Clash On Monday Night Football">{{cite web | work=Packers.com | url=http://www0.nfl.packers.com/news/releases/2004/11/24/2/ | title=Iron-Man Favre To Make 200th Consecutive Start As Packers-Rams Clash On Monday Night Football | accessdate= 2011-01-11}}</ref><ref>{{cite web | work=Statesman.com | url=http://www.statesman.com/sports/pro/nfl-iron-man-brett-favre-finally-sits-one-1118539.html | title=NFL Iron Man Brett Favre finally sits one out | accessdate= 2011-01-11}}</ref> {| class="wikitable" |- !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Rank !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Player !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Pos !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Period !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Teams !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Consecutive Starts !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Playoffs !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Total |- |1 |[[Brett Favre]]<ref name="Brett Favre -
